page.title: 18Churches in Whitchurch.
page.content: The church in Whitchurch is dedicated to All Hallows.It is built of flint and stone and was restored in 1868 and has looked like that since.The church dates from the 13th Century and many believe that there has been a church on this site for over a thousand years. There is also opportunity to worship at other churches in the town.There is a Catholic church in the town which has recently been built,this is in Bell Street.There is a Methodist church in Winchester Street,there are regular Salvation Army meetings in Winchester Street.There is also a Christian Fellowship group which meets in the Parish Hall.
